extendedInfo.description: Race the flood of water to connect the pipes before it leaks in this fast-paced, addicting and challenging puzzle game.- 2 difficulty modes- Save your game and return later- Unlimited replay with no two games ever the same- Online scoreboardFor even more features, get the full version, Pipe Dreams.

reviews.comment: After update the game doesn\'t play right. Counts each tap as 2 and deducts points for the mistake! Fix soon or will lose more ratings! Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Double tap
reviews.comment: Every time I place a pipe, the one after the intended pipe is placed. Would be 5 stars if not for that glitch. Great classic, otherwise. Droid 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not very good. Can\'t even restart level. You have to click go back to main menu and look at paid version advertisement for 5 seconds every time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this game is garbage. Pieces do whatever they want. Shows one piece and another is place. Poor game and I will be uninstalling it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: On Droid X, post 2.2 patch, pipe placement is buggy for me. Places 2 pieces at once, each time I go to play a connection. Otherwise it\'s fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Droid X 2.2 - This would ve a great game if out worked correctly, but it places 2 pieces at once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Way to much begging for money. Feels like I\'m dealing with a 2 year old. UNINSTALL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dealing w/cap pieces is annoying. Pieces should be shown above board. Plays ok, just wish caps weren\'t needed. Why\'re T pipes even in the game?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really fun game to pass the time. The adds between levels of the free version are the only things I don\'t like. HTC incredible
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: needs a creative update. this is just an old nintendo game remake. next pieces should be on top not bottom under finger. ads suck!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Solid app, but too hard for my taste. I used to be pretty good at Pipe Dream, but feel like I end up replacing pieces way too many times to be fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unplayable. Resgiters double taps when laying pipe in a blank space. Droid x.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Looks cool but isn\'t. Annoying having to place pieces while i wait for right ones to appear which takes forever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent game. Pipe order is not well distributed, what can I build with 18 end caps?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved it on my Droid, but now it skips ahead a piece every move on my Droid2, i want to play it but can\'t
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Droid X - every touch is a double touch, so its ridiculously hard to play & you score is always terrible bc you\'re double laying every piece of pipe
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is an awesome game ! Cant put the phone down.. delilah
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It used to work before an update. Now it skips to the second piece and charges points for the one skipped. LAME!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: To long without getting needed piece. Ads very annoying. End game screen pops up and blocks your level no way to minimize to see if or what went wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the worst game I ever downloaded. There is nothing good about this game.
reviews.author: A Google User
